### overcommit

overcommitLinuxOOM killer

overcommit(vm.overcommit_memory)
- 0  Heuristic overcommit handling. overcommitovercommitmalloc
- 1  Always overcommit. overcommit
- 2  Dont overcommit. overcommit

## OOM killer
overcommitOOM killerLinux
OOM killer Out Of Memory Killer?

> OMM killerlinuxkill


- `/proc/<pid>/oom_score_adj`, -10001000 -1000 badness score 0
- `/proc/<pid>/oom_adj`, -17+15-17kill
- `/proc/<pid>/oom_score`, CPU(utime + stime)(uptime - start time)oom_adj

Linux

### OOM killer
java tomcatid`ps -ef | grep java`
`grep "Out of memory" /var/log/messages`id

![image.png](https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/5e8bc25d25784a47ad2f4c2780581d1d~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image?)



# 

## OOM()

```shell
sysctl -w vm.overcommit_memory=2
```

```shell
echo "vm.overcommit_memory=2" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
```

oom_score_adj

```shell
sudo echo -1000 > /proc/$pid/oom_score_adj
```
oom_adj:
- /proc/PID/oom_adj-17

## java()
java tomcat
```shell
java -Xms512m -Xmx512m -jar xxx.jar
```
- Xms: 
- Xmx: 
tomcat`TOMCAT_HOME/bin/catalina.sh`:
```shell
# cygwin=false
JAVA_OPTS="-server -Xms256m -Xmx512m -XX:PermSize=64M -XX:MaxPermSize=128m"
```

## java()

1. `crontab`
2. Java `jsvc`tomcat`daemon.sh`

Post.title: bpmn-js
Post._content:
# # ## > : ## ### BPM `BPM(Business Process Management)` `BPM` ### BPMN `BPMNBusiness Process Model And Notation` `BPMIBusiness Process Management Initiative`BPMN `BPMN``BPM` `BPMN``BPM` `BPMN` ### `BPMN` - `Osworkflow`,osworkflow - `JBPM`, `JBPM4`JBPM5`Drools Flow` JBPM4 - `Activiti`, activiti5activiti6`JBPM4``activiti7`6`Tijs Rademakers` - [`flowable`](https://flowable.com/open-source), activiti6flowable6.4.1 - [`Camunda`](https://docs.camunda.org/manual/7.18/), Camundaactiviti5PVM ### : - [bpmn-js](https://bpmn.io/), BPMN 2.0 Web Web BPMN BPMN - [mxGraph](http://jgraph.github.io/mxgraph/)JavaScriptmxGraphjs - [Activiti-Modeler] Activiti web, - [flowable-modeler]flowableweb, ### [`Camunda`](https://docs.camunda.org/manual/7.18/)+[bpmn-js](https://bpmn.io/) # - `Camunda` - `bpmn-js``bnpm` ## Camunda 1. docker ```shell docker pull camunda/camunda-bpm-platform:run-latest docker run -d --name camunda -p 8080:8080 camunda/camunda-bpm-platform:run-latest ``` 2. `spring boot` pom.xml ```xml 4.0.0 org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-parent 2.4.4 com.tencent camunda_spring_boot 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT camunda_spring_boot camunda_spring_boot 17 7.15.0 org.camunda.bpm.springboot camunda-bpm-spring-boot-starter-webapp ${camunda.spring-boot.version} com.h2database h2 com.sun.xml.bind jaxb-impl 2.2.3 org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-test test org.springframework.boot spring-boot-maven-plugin ``` 3. application.properties ```properties camunda.bpm: admin-user: id: demo password: demo firstName: Demo filter: create: All tasks ``` 4. `bpmn-js`xml`src/main/resources/loan-approval.bpmn` [http://localhost:8080/camunda/app/cockpit/default/#/dashboard](http://localhost:8080/camunda/app/cockpit/default/#/dashboard) ## bpmn-js [demo](/fedlearn/code/bpmn-js/index.html) ```html BPMNJS
``` # `BPNM`[camunda](https://docs.camunda.org/manual/7.18/) + [bpmn-js](https://bpmn.io/) `BPNM`[camunda](https://docs.camunda.org/manual/7.18/)[bpmn-js](https://bpmn.io/) # [camunda Spring Boot](http://shaochenfeng.com/camunda/10.%E5%88%9B%E5%BB%BA_camunda_spring_boot_%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE/) [bpmn.js-http](https://juejin.cn/post/6844904017592614919)

# monorepo

[Lerna](https://lerna.js.org)[Nx]()

`Nrwl`

## Lerna


```shell
npx lerna init
```

PS: npx
- npxNode Package Execute node
- npx npm v5.2.0npm 
- 
- npx `npx lerna init`npm`lerna-cli``lerna init`



```
packages/
    header/
        src/
            ...
        package.json
        rollup.config.json
        jest.config.js

    footer/
        src/
            ...
        package.json
        rollup.config.json
        jest.config.js

    remixapp/
        app/
            ...
        public/
        package.json
        remix.config.js

package.json
lerna.json #  
```

`package.json`npm/yarn/pnpm workspace

```
{
  "name": "root",
  "private": true,
  "workspaces": ["packages/*"],
  "devDependencies": {
    "lerna": "6.0.1"
  }
}
```

## 

- `lerna run xxx` scriptslerna run build
- `npx nx graph`
- `npx lerna add-caching``nx.json`
- `npx lerna publish --no-private`: npm
- `npx lerna run xxx --scope=header`header


 [Lerna](https://lerna.js.org/docs/api-reference/commands)
## NX


> [NX](https://nx.dev/)Monorepo




```
npx create-nx-workspace@latest package-based --preset=npm
```

`packages`
```
package-based/
 packages/
    is-even/
        index.ts
        package.json
    is-odd/
        index.ts
        package.json
 nx.json
 package.json
```

 `nx.json`
```
// nx.json
{
  ...
  "targetDefaults": {
    "build": {
      "dependsOn": ["^build"]
    }
  }
}
```

`npx nx build is-odd` `is-event`

`npx nx run-many --target=build`


## CI/CD

CI/CD

- CI/CD
- NPM
- CD
